short_description: Apple’s latest flagship smartphone featuring the A17 Pro chip, titanium design, advanced camera system, and iOS 17.
target_audience: Tech-savvy professionals, early adopters, and premium smartphone users aged 20–45 with disposable income.
objective: Drive product awareness and increase sales among high-value segments.
key_messages: The most powerful iPhone ever with the A17 Pro chip.
Durable titanium design, lightweight yet strong.
visual_direction: Futuristic, cinematic visuals with bold contrasts. Sleek animations showcasing speed, power, and elegance.
constraints: Must maintain Apple’s minimalist, luxury brand guidelines. Avoid cluttered design or casual slang.
success_metrics: Global sales within the first quarter
